summary: The document is a confidential record from the National Archives, released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details the activities of Cuban trained Peruvian guerrillas, originating from the CIA and addressed to the Director of CIA. Dated April 11, 1963, it spans 5 pages and is part of the National Security Files, specifically concerning Cuba and intelligence material from June to July 1963. The document was last reviewed on September 10, 2000, and its classification suggests it was once confidential or secret.
key_findings: Document is related to the JFK assassination records.
Originates from the CIA and discusses Cuban trained Peruvian guerrillas.
Part of the National Security Files, focusing on Cuba and intelligence operations.
Indicates a review process, with the last review occurring in 2000.
